bill.summary:
Campus Prevention and Recovery Services for Students Act of 2018
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reauthorize through FY2025 and revise the drug and alcohol abuse prevention program, including to expand the program to include efforts to prevent substance misuse on campuses.
